title: Magdalena Abakanowicz workshop, Cell Block Theatre, Sydney
creator_credit: Film Australia, Malcolm Otton and Christopher McGill
brief_description: At her four day workshop in Sydney’s Cell Block Theatre in 1976, Magdalena tries to draw the students’ attention to problems like shape, scale, tension between forms space and light. The workshop is shown in progress in four stages of development. Narration by Anne Haddy.
